name: 王伯雅
objective:
本課程藉由業界專家的分享與各種商務場合的情境模擬，讓同學能透過
掌握「有效溝通」方式，進而提升團隊士氣與工作效能。
We invite the domestic speakers, as the outstanding scholars of cross-cultural communication, to share their knowledge and experiences with students. Student can also learn from practical scenarios in order to motivate and help team members be as productive as possible.
